Oh! Are you here to get the Floating Stone?
I was told to expect guests.

This way here is called the Path of the Unknown!
So called because different boss monsters always appear there. It’s hard to predict who!
If that frightens you, you can pick another path.

For your information, you’ll get a Defense Buff when you defeat a boss monster.

If you think you’re up for the task,
destroy the Path Selection Manacache.

You won’t be able to choose another path once the stone is destroyed, so choose carefully!
